product_name: Sting Eze Max 2 Insect Bite Relief Pen - 0.5 fl. oz.
long_description: Sting Eze Max 2 insect bite relief pen features double the amount of benzocaine in the original Sting Eze to bring faster relief to the worst bites and stings. Helps relieve pain and itching associated with bites and stings from mosquitoes, bees, wasps, fire ants, ticks and chiggers. Sponge tip applicator allows for easy application. Active ingredients: benzocaine 10%, phenol 1.35%.
short_description: Sting Eze Max 2 insect bite relief pen features double the amount of benzocaine in the original Sting Eze to bring faster relief to the worst bites and stings.
